model
Class OptionList

java.lang.Object
  model.OptionList

public class OptionList
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Eric Foote An OptionList represents a set of options that fall under a single category in an invitation. Each instance of the Invitation class will store a list of these objects, one for each category that users can vote on. Information about which users have voted for which options are stored in the form of phone numbers. So, to add or remove the votes from a particular user, the user's phone number is passed in as an argument.

getVotersFor

public int[] getVotersFor(java.lang.String option)
Similar to getNumVotesFor, getVotersFor returns a list of phone numbers of all the users who have voted for a particular option

Parameters:
option - - the option to get the voters for
Returns:
- a list of users who have voted for the option

getVotesOf

public java.lang.String[] getVotesOf(int user)
Retrieve a list of all the options that a particular user has voted for.

Parameters:
user - - phone number of the user whose votes to retrieve
Returns:
- an array containing the names of each of the options that the user has selected

getAllOptions

public java.lang.String[] getAllOptions()
get a list of all the options in this list

Returns:
